panels.description:
Overall pressure for this PostgreSQL Node and Instance. 
max(node:ins:cpu_usage, pg:ins:load, pgbouncer:ins:load)
panels.title: Instance Pressure 1m

panels.description: ▲ for read bandwidth, ▼ for write bandwidth
panels.title: Read/Write Bandwidth

panels.description: Postgres transactions per second according to last 1m, 5m, 15m
panels.title: Cluster Xact Commit Rate

panels.description: Postgres rollbacked transactions per second according to last 1m, 5m, 15m
panels.title: Cluster Xact Rollback

panels.description: Pgbouncer transactions per second according to last 1m, 5m, 15m
panels.title: Cluster TPS (Pgbouncer)

panels.description: Pgbouncer average transaction response time in last 1m, 5m, 15m
panels.title: Cluster Xact RT (Pgbouncer)

panels.description: Pgbouncer Queries per second according to last 1m, 5m, 15m
panels.title: Cluster QPS

panels.description: Pgbouncer query average response time in last 1m, 5m, 15m
panels.title: Cluster Query RT

panels.description: Pgbouncer Queries per second according to last 1m, 5m, 15m
panels.title: Leader ${primary} QPS

panels.description: Pgbouncer query average response time in last 1m, 5m, 15m
panels.title: Leader ${primary} Query RT

list.description: Cluster identifier for this postgres instance, cls should be unique among entire environment. such as pg-meta, pg-test
list.label: Cluster
list.name: cls
